remarks: Equality deduction for conditional operator.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)  AV:  This theorem already exists as ~ ifbieq12d .  TODO (NM):  Please replace the usage of this theorem by ~ ifbieq12d then delete this theorem.  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ifeq123d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ifeq123d.2 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
ifeq123d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C = D ) $.
ifeq123d $p |- ( ph -> if ( ps , A , C ) = if ( ch , B , D ) ) $.
